content.question: A government budget deficit exists when

choices.label: the current account is in surplus
the capital and financial account is in deficit
government spending is greater than tax revenues
the demand for money is greater than the supply of money
the demand for loanable funds is greater than the supply of loanable funds

content.answer: government spending is greater than tax revenues
